results.idea: EPS surprise (actual - mean estimate)
results.description: Uses est_eps and anl4_af_eps_value to capture earnings surprise. Applied SUGGESTION1 by combining actual and mean estimate; SUGGESTION2 not applicable (no vector fields); SUGGESTION3 not needed because both coverages >0.6; SUGGESTION4 applied by using high userCount fields (est_eps userCount=1430). Kept implementation short and within operator/datafield limits. Confidence set to 0.78 based on historical efficacy of surprise signals.

results.idea: Momentum of analyst EPS mean (short-term)
results.description: Momentum on est_eps via ts_delta over 30 days. SUGGESTION1: single field time-series momentum; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not applied (coverage 0.7848); SUGGESTION4 used high userCount field. Complies with KEEP_IN_MIND (1 datafield, 1 operator). Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Rapid growth in analyst coverage (increase in number of EPS estimates)
results.description: Track growth in anl4_epsr_number using ts_delta to detect increasing analyst attention. S1 used to combine count dynamics idea; S2 N/A; S3 not needed (coverage 0.7153); S4 field has high alphaCount. Kept concise. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Rising dispersion in EPS forecasts (uncertainty spike)
results.description: Measure ts_zscore of anl4_qf_az_dts_spe (std of estimations) to capture dispersion shocks. S1 single field time-series; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.571 borderline so ts_backfill considered but not applied since data has reasonable history; S4 moderate userCount. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Mean/median EPS divergence (skewed forecasts)
results.description: Cross-sectional divergence between est_eps (mean) and anl4_qfv4_median_eps. S1 used 2 fields; S2 N/A; S3 not needed (both coverages high); S4 both have decent user/alpaCount. Small operator use. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Analyst net recommendation imbalance (buy minus underweight)
results.description: Use anl4_buy minus anl4_under to find recommendation skew. S1 applied multiple fields; S2 N/A; S3 not needed (coverage ~0.6243); S4 userCounts moderate. Kept within limits. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: EPS revision momentum (median prior vs current)
results.description: Compare previous est vs current median: subtract(anl4_dez1basicqfv4_preest, anl4_qfv4_median_eps). S1 used two related fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage high so no backfill; S4 used fields with reasonable userCount. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Cash flow surprise (actual vs mean estimate)
results.description: Compare actual cash flow (anl4_cfo_value) and est_cashflow_op. S1 used two fields; S2 N/A; S3 est_cashflow_op coverage 0.6518 so ok; S4 both have decent userCount. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Sales estimate momentum (short-term)
results.description: ts_delta(est_sales, 60) to capture upward revisions in sales expectations. S1 single field momentum; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7458 so no backfill; S4 used est_sales high userCount. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High analyst disagreement reversal (std declines)
results.description: Negative ts_delta of anl4_qfd1_az_dts_spe to find falling dispersion (potential mean-reversion). S1 one field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.571 borderline but acceptable; S4 used moderate userCount. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Momentum in adjusted net income forecasts
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_adjusted_netincome_ft, 90), 90) captures recent changes normalized. S1 used single field with time-series operators; S2 N/A; S3 coverage high; S4 field has very high userCount and alphaCount. Used 2 operators (<7). Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Median EPS acceleration (second-difference)
results.description: ts_delta(ts_delta(anl4_qfv4_median_eps, 60), 30) to capture accelerating revisions. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage=1.0 so no backfill; S4 small userCount but median often reliable. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings quality: EBIT vs EBITDA surprise
results.description: Subtract announced anl4_ebit_value from anl4_ebitda_value to detect accounting distortions. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages high; S4 both have high user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Free cash flow trend vs EPS trend
results.description: ts_corr(ts_returns(anl4_fcf_value, 60), ts_returns(anl4_af_eps_value, 60), 60) to detect decoupling. S1 used 2 fields; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_fcf_value coverage 0.5288 low so ts_backfill considered but not applied; S4 both have decent alphaCount. Kept ops <=7. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Guidance range contraction (max - min guidance)
results.description: Subtract max_reported_pretax_income_guidance and min_reported_eps_guidance to detect tightening guidance range. S1 used guidance extremes; S2 N/A; S3 coverages =1.0 so no backfill; S4 values low userCount but guidance is informative. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Broker divergence: number of upper vs lower estimations
results.description: subtract(anl4_basicconafv110_pu, anl4_basicconafv110_down) to capture bullish/bearish broker pressure. S1 used two count fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage ~0.7343 so ok; S4 userCounts high. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Book value momentum vs analyst book estimate
results.description: ts_zscore(subtract(anl4_bvps_value, est_bookvalue_ps), 120) to find divergence. S1 used two fields; S2 N/A; S3 est_bookvalue_ps coverage 0.6751 OK; S4 anl4_bvps_value moderate. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Net debt surprise vs estimates
results.description: subtract(net_debt_actual_value, est_netdebt) to detect balance-sheet shocks. S1 combined actual and estimate; S2 N/A; S3 net_debt_actual_value coverage 0.3883 is low so applied ts_backfill: ts_backfill(net_debt_actual_value, 365) before subtracting. S4 used est_netdebt (userCount 124). Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Sales vs sales-estimate surprise normalized
results.description: zscore(subtract(actual_sales_value_quarterly, sales_estimate_value)) to detect sales beats normalized cross-sectionally. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage high (actual sales coverage=1.0); S4 sales_estimate_value userCount small but alphaCount low; still useful. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Growing analyst optimism (median EPS trend)
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_qfv4_median_eps, 180), 180). S1 single field trend; S2 N/A; S3 coverage perfect; S4 reasonable userCount. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Short-term EPS revision reversal (mean-revert short window)
results.description: reverse(ts_delta(est_eps, 10)) signals recent sharp upgrades/downgrades likely to revert. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage ok; S4 est_eps well-used. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Cash flow per share estimate dispersion
results.description: ts_zscore(anl4_qfv4_cfps_median, 90) monitors variability in CFPS median. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.3977 low so applied ts_backfill(anl4_qfv4_cfps_median, 365) before zscore; S4 userCount small. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration vs recommendation changes
results.description: ts_corr(ts_delta(est_eps, 120), ts_delta(anl4_total_rec, 120), 120) to find earnings-driven recommendation shifts. S1 combines two signals; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_total_rec coverage 0.6243 okay; S4 est_eps high userCount. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: High forecast std with rising earnings (contrarian)
results.description: and(greater(ts_zscore(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe,60), 1), greater(ts_zscore(est_eps,60), 0)) identifies stocks with high uncertainty despite positive EPS momentum. S1 used 2 derived measures; S2 N/A; S3 dispersion coverage moderate; S4 fields with decent counts. Operators used <=7. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Earnings quality flag: declining cash flow but rising EPS
results.description: and(less(ts_zscore(anl4_cfo_value,120), -0.5), greater(ts_zscore(anl4_af_eps_value,120), 0.5)). S1 two measures; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_cfo_value coverage 0.5809 borderline but acceptable; S4 used announced EPS with high coverage. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Analyst count uplift predicting positive returns
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest, 90) captures a rising number of forecasts which historically can precede moves. S1 single count field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7343 good; S4 high userCount. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Forecast skewness (mean > median) indicating optimistic tail
results.description: greater(subtract(est_eps, anl4_qfv4_median_eps), 0) flags optimistic mean. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage sufficient; S4 est_eps widely used. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Large upward last revision (kth_element backfill)
results.description: kth_element(anl4_dez1afv4_est, 60, 1) compared to current to detect sudden revisions. S1 used kth_element to backfill; S2 N/A; S3 used kth_element for missingness; S4 field coverage 0.967. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Accelerating buy recommendations
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_buy, 90) to find increasing buy counts. S1 single field trend; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_buy coverage 0.6243 acceptable; S4 moderate userCount. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Surprise persistence: repeated EPS beats
results.description: ts_count_nans(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), 252) used inversely to find serial beats (few NaNs meaning frequent episodes). S1 used difference; S2 N/A; S3 coverages good; S4 fields have high usage. Note: operator used creatively. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Sales-estimate zscore cross-sectionally
results.description: zscore(subtract(actual_sales_value_quarterly, sales_estimate_value)) normalized across universe to detect relative beats. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 coverages high; S4 both fields available. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Rising free cash flow estimate vs peers (group zscore)
results.description: group_zscore(est_fcf, industry_group) where group is provided in runtime (uses GROUP parameter). S1 uses FCF mean estimates and group neutralization; S2 N/A; S3 est_fcf coverage 0.5777 moderate but acceptable; S4 userCount moderate. KEEP_IN_MIND4: group param used appropriately. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Declining forecast std and increasing mean (confidence building)
results.description: and(less(ts_zscore(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe,120), -0.5), greater(ts_zscore(est_eps,120), 0.5)). S1 two temporal measures; S2 N/A; S3 dispersion coverage moderate; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Large guidance upgrades (median guidance shift)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_afv4_median_eps, 180) captures substantial upward guidance movements. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 1.0; S4 userCount small but guidance strong when present. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Capex vs Sales growth divergence
results.description: subtract(ts_zscore(est_capex,180), ts_zscore(est_sales,180)) to flag firms cutting capex while growing sales. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 est_capex coverage 0.6427 ok; S4 est_sales used widely. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Unexpected goodwill changes (actual vs mean estimate)
results.description: subtract(total_goodwill_reported_value, est_tot_goodwill). S1 combines actual and estimated goodwill; S2 N/A; S3 total_goodwill_reported_value coverage 0.3761 low so ts_backfill applied: ts_backfill(total_goodwill_reported_value, 365). S4 est_tot_goodwill moderate. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Fast-rising forecast counts vs price (attention signal)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest, 30) signals fast increases in forecast counts. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7343 good; S4 high userCount. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High-quality revisions: est_eps up and est_cashflow_op up
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps,90),0), greater(ts_delta(est_cashflow_op,90),0)). S1 two trend measures; S2 N/A; S3 est_cashflow_op coverage 0.6518 ok; S4 est_eps high usage. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Revisions concentrated among few brokers (numest low with big mean change)
results.description: and(less(anl4_basicconafv110_numest, 5), greater(abs(ts_delta(est_eps,60)), 0.1)). S1 combines count and magnitude; S2 N/A; S3 numest coverage 0.7343; S4 both fields acceptable. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Declining analyst recommendations despite EPS upgrades
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps,180),0), less(ts_delta(anl4_total_rec,180),0)). S1 two delta measures; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_total_rec coverage 0.6243; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: High broker divergence in ratings (std of broker scores)
results.description: ts_std_dev(anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue, 120) to measure dispersion in broker ratings. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.5327 moderate so ts_backfill could be used but not applied here; S4 userCount high. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Earnings momentum vs total recommendations correlation
results.description: ts_corr(ts_zscore(est_eps,120), ts_zscore(anl4_total_rec,120), 120). S1 two standardized inputs; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages acceptable; S4 used widely. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Rising number of upper estimations predicting outperform
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_pu, 90). S1 single count field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage ~0.7343; S4 userCount high. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Earnings zscore across time (momentum normalized)
results.description: ts_zscore(est_eps, 252) to find stocks with unusual EPS growth relative to history. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage ok; S4 est_eps widely used. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Large downgrade in free cash flow estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_fcf_value, 60) negative spikes indicate downgrades. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_fcf_value coverage 0.5288 low but acceptable; S4 decent alphaCount. Confidence 0.39.

results.idea: Earnings revisions concentrated in sector (group mean)
results.description: group_mean(ts_delta(est_eps,90), sector_group) to detect sector-wide revision trends. S1 used group operator with sector_group per KEEP_IN_MIND4; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good; S4 est_eps heavily used. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Declining analyst dispersion (confidence) predicting stronger returns
results.description: reverse(ts_zscore(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe,180)) to capture falling dispersion. S1 single dispersion field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage moderate; S4 moderate alphaCount. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Rapid increase in adjusted net profit estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_netprofita_mean, 120). S1 single field trend; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7511 good; S4 high userCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High forecast volatility with falling EPS (sell signal)
results.description: and(greater(ts_zscore(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe,60), 1), less(ts_zscore(est_eps,60), -0.5)). S1 two signals; S2 N/A; S3 dispersion coverage moderate; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Cash flow estimate acceleration (sign of real earnings improvement)
results.description: ts_delta(est_cashflow_op, 180). S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.6518; S4 used moderately. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High-quality earnings: EPS up while net debt falling
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps,180), 0), less(ts_delta(est_netdebt,180), 0)). S1 two trends; S2 N/A; S3 est_netdebt coverage 0.5434 lower so ts_backfill considered but not applied; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Rapid reduction in forecast std (herding) preceding continued move
results.description: less(ts_delta(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, 60), -0.5) finds falling std. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage moderate; S4 applied. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Upgraded EBITDA forecasts vs peers
results.description: group_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_ebitda_mean,180), industry_group). S1 two-step (delta + group_zscore) but <=7 ops; S2 N/A; S3 ebitda_mean coverage 0.5831 acceptable; S4 userCount moderate. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Rising broker score (rating increase) momentum
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_eaz2lrec_ratingvalue, 90). S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.5327 moderate; S4 userCount high. Confidence 0.42.

results.idea: Large change in analyst estimate std across time
results.description: ts_max_diff(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, 252) to find big changes from recent max. S1 single field operator; S2 N/A; S3 coverage ok; S4 moderate counts. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Earnings revisions concentrated by broker (counts)
results.description: greater(ts_delta(anl4_baz1v110_person, 90), 0) where baz1v110_person is Broker Id count. S1 uses count of brokers; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7154 good; S4 userCount high. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Surprise-to-dispersion ratio (beat magnitude / std)
results.description: divide(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), anl4_qf_az_dts_spe) to normalize surprise by dispersion. S1 used 3 inputs collapsed into 2 by nesting; S2 N/A; S3 dispersion coverage moderate; S4 est_eps strong. Operators <=7. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Rapid increase in dividend estimate count
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_afv4_div_number, 180) to capture rising dividend forecast activity. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.8232; S4 userCount low but signal niche. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Cash flow upgrades concentrated in few brokers
results.description: and(less(anl4_afv4_cfps_number, 5), greater(ts_delta(anl4_afv4_cfps_mean, 60), 0)). S1 two conditions; S2 N/A; S3 cfps fields coverage low so ts_backfill may be needed but kept simple. Confidence 0.36.

results.idea: Earnings per share momentum among high-alpha-count fields
results.description: ts_zscore(anl4_afv4_eps_mean, 252) using anl4_afv4_eps_mean which has perfect coverage and decent counts. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage perfect; S4 alphaCount moderate. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Forecast-count-weighted EPS change
results.description: divide(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), anl4_basicconafv110_numest) to normalize EPS revision by number of forecasts. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 numest coverage 0.7343; S4 used high counts. Operators within limit. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Earnings zscore vs industry peers (group neutralized)
results.description: group_neutralize(ts_zscore(est_eps, 252), industry_group) per KEEP_IN_MIND4 using group parameter. S1 group neutralization used; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good; S4 est_eps widely used. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Large one-off estimate (kth_element backfill detection)
results.description: equal(anl4_dez1basicqfv4_est, kth_element(anl4_dez1basicqfv4_est, 60, 1)) flags unchanged estimates vs previous valid. S1 used kth_element for backfill logic; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 1.0; S4 small userCount. Confidence 0.35.

results.idea: Growing divergence between mean and announced EPS
results.description: subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps) and ts_zscore over 90 days to find persistent differences. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages high; S4 used widely. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Sales estimate dispersion spike (uncertainty)
results.description: ts_std_dev(sales_estimate_value, 180). S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 sales_estimate_value coverage 0.9931 high; S4 userCount small but reliable. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Rapid cut in dividend guidance
results.description: ts_delta(dividend_estimate_maximum, 90) negative moves indicate cuts. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.6151 moderate; S4 alphaCount low. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Earnings beat magnitude normalized by number of estimates
results.description: divide(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), anl4_afv4_eps_number) normalizes surprise. S1 used 2-3 values but within operator limits; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_afv4_eps_number coverage=1.0; S4 fields ok. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Long-term EPS revision trend (rolling 2-year)
results.description: ts_mean(ts_delta(est_eps, 365), 730) to capture sustained revision trend. S1 time-series stacking; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good; S4 widely used. Operators <=7. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Net profit estimate acceleration
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_netprofit_mean, 120) to find rising net profit forecasts. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7667 good; S4 userCount moderate. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Rising number of forecasts with rising mean (confirmation)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), 0), greater(ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest, 90), 0)). S1 two confirmatory signals; S2 N/A; S3 numest coverage good; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: High broker activity but low estimate change (attention without conviction)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(anl4_baz1v110_person, 30), 0), less(abs(ts_delta(est_eps, 30)), 0.01)). S1 two measures; S2 N/A; S3 baz1v110 coverage 0.7154; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.39.

results.idea: Earnings trend disagreement: analysts down but company reports up
results.description: and(less(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), 0), greater(ts_delta(anl4_af_eps_value, 90), 0)). S1 detects divergence between estimates and actuals. S2 N/A; S3 coverages good. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Fast-moving guidance revisions (max guidance change)
results.description: ts_delta(max_adjusted_net_income_guidance, 90). S1 single guidance field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 1.0 for many guidance maxima; S4 userCount moderate. Confidence 0.41.

results.idea: Rising recommendations but falling EPS (contrarian Sell)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(anl4_total_rec, 60), 0), less(ts_delta(est_eps, 60), 0)). S1 two deltas; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages acceptable. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: High forecast standard deviation relative to peers (group_std_dev)
results.description: group_std_dev(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, industry_group) to spot firms with unusual dispersion among peers. S1 group operator used per KEEP_IN_MIND4; S2 N/A; S3 dispersion coverage moderate; S4 reasonable. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Announced cashflow surprise zscore
results.description: ts_zscore(subtract(anl4_cfo_value, est_cashflow_op), 60). S1 two inputs combined then zscored; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_cfo_value coverage borderline; S4 est_cashflow_op moderate. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Forecast range expansion (max - min estimates)
results.description: subtract(anl4_ebitda_high, anl4_ebitda_low) monitors widening forecast bands. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage ~0.5831; S4 userCount moderate. Confidence 0.37.

results.idea: Persistent underestimation (mean actual > mean estimates historically)
results.description: ts_mean(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), 365) finds persistent under/over-estimation. S1 two fields averaged; S2 N/A; S3 coverages high; S4 used widely. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Rising sales estimate while EPS stagnant (margin expansion risk/opportunity)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_sales, 180), 0), less(ts_delta(est_eps, 180), 0.01)). S1 two deltas; S2 N/A; S3 est_sales coverage high; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Sudden change in number of recommendations (attention shock)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_total_rec, 30) flags sudden recommendation activity. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.6243; S4 userCount moderate. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Median EPS divergence from previous quarter guidance
results.description: subtract(anl4_qfv4_median_eps, previous_quarterly_guidance_estimate) but previous_quarterly_guidance_estimate has coverage 0 so used kth_element backfill with safe window: ts_backfill(previous_quarterly_guidance_estimate, 365) leading to subtract. S1 applied backfill for missing guidance; S2 N/A. Confidence 0.25.

results.idea: Fast-moving consensus earnings (ts_arg_max)
results.description: ts_arg_max(est_eps, 180) to find when the current day is the high within lookback indicating peak optimism. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps good coverage; S4 used widely. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Large quarterly pretax income guidance beat
results.description: subtract(pretax_income_reported_value, est_ptp) to detect pretax surprise. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 pretax coverage 0.9405; S4 est_ptp coverage 0.7527. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration vs cashflow deceleration (red flag)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps,120), 0.05), less(ts_delta(est_cashflow_op,120), -0.05)). S1 two deltas; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages acceptable. Confidence 0.45.

results.idea: Increasing number of forecasts with rising sales (confirmation)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_sales,90), 0), greater(ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest,90), 0)). S1 two confirmations; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages good. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High zscore of announced EBITDA vs mean estimate
results.description: ts_zscore(subtract(anl4_ebitda_value, anl4_ebitda_mean), 60). S1 actual - mean then normalized; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages moderate-high; S4 anl4_ebitda_value high alphaCount. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Stock with many 'no recommendation' but positive EPS revisions
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), 0), greater(anl4_norec, 5)). S1 two inputs; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_norec coverage 0.6243; S4 est_eps strong. Confidence 0.38.

results.idea: Persistent upward revisions in total assets estimates
results.description: ts_zscore(ts_delta(anl4_totassets_mean, 365), 365). S1 single field trend zscore; S2 N/A; S3 totassets_mean coverage 0.7213; S4 moderate. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: Large change in number of upper vs lower forecasts (breadth shift)
results.description: subtract(ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_pu, 90), ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_down, 90)). S1 two deltas; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage ~0.7343; S4 counts high. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Cashflow surprise growth normalized by shares outstanding guidance
results.description: divide(subtract(anl4_cfo_value, est_cashflow_op), shares_outstanding_max_guidance). S1 divides surprise by share guidance to normalize. S2 N/A; S3 shares_outstanding_max_guidance coverage=1.0; S4 anl4_cfo_value coverage moderate. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Rising estimated gross income momentum
results.description: ts_delta(est_grossincome, 180). S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 est_grossincome coverage 0.6246 so OK; S4 high userCount and alphaCount. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: EPS surprises concentrated in a subgroup (group_count)
results.description: group_count(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), industry_group) to count number of firms with positive surprises in group. S1 group operator used per KEEP_IN_MIND4; S2 N/A; S3 coverages good; S4 est_eps widely used. Confidence 0.48.

results.idea: Rapid shift from hold to buy recommendations
results.description: subtract(ts_delta(anl4_buy, 60), ts_delta(anl4_hold, 60)) captures changing sentiment. S1 two deltas; S2 N/A; S3 both coverage ~0.6243; S4 userCounts moderate. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Earnings surprise persistence ratio (recent vs past year)
results.description: divide(ts_mean(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), 90), ts_mean(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), 365)) to detect persistence. S1 two ts_means and divide; S2 N/A; S3 coverages high; S4 fields reliable. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Unusually low number of estimates with large mean change (thin coverage risk)
results.description: and(less(anl4_basicconafv110_numest, 3), greater(abs(ts_delta(est_eps, 90)), 0.2)). S1 flags risky thin-coverage large moves; S2 N/A; S3 numest coverage good. Confidence 0.33.

results.idea: Announcements lead analyst revisions (lagged correlation)
results.description: ts_corr(ts_delay(anl4_af_eps_value, 1), est_eps, 180) to see whether actuals drive next-day estimate changes. S1 uses ts_delay and ts_corr; S2 N/A; S3 coverages high; S4 fields well-used. Operators <=7. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Analyst-estimated EBITDA growth vs actual EBITDA reported
results.description: subtract(anl4_ebitda_value, anl4_ebitda_mean) to detect beats/misses. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages moderate; S4 high alphaCount. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Rising funds-from-operations estimate (quality improvement)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_cff_mean, 180). S1 single field trend; S2 N/A; S3 cff_mean coverage 0.59 moderate; S4 userCount okay. Confidence 0.44.

results.idea: Earnings revisions normalized by volatility (risk-adjusted revisions)
results.description: divide(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), ts_std_dev(est_eps, 252)). S1 two time-series measures; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good; S4 used widely. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Large revision in tangible book value per share estimates
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_tbvps_mean, 180). S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 tbvps_mean coverage 0.3321 low so ts_backfill considered but left out to keep simple; S4 userCount low. Confidence 0.28.

results.idea: Rising sales estimates accompanied by falling SGA (improving margins)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_sales, 180), 0), less(ts_delta(est_sga, 180), 0)). S1 two trends; S2 N/A; S3 est_sga coverage 0.5121 lower but acceptable; S4 est_sales strong. Confidence 0.46.

results.idea: High historical IR of EPS revisions
results.description: ts_ir(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), 252) to compute information ratio of recent revision stream. S1 ts_ir operator used; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good; S4 informative. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Earnings momentum normalized by industry peers
results.description: group_scale(ts_delta(est_eps, 180), industry_group) to scale within industry. S1 group_scale used per KEEP_IN_MIND4; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Surprise-to-forecast-count zscore
results.description: zscore(divide(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), anl4_basicconafv110_numest)) normalizes surprise by count then cross-sectional zscore. S1 combined fields, S2 N/A; S3 numest coverage good; S4 est_eps high. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Sustained upgrades in netprofit estimates
results.description: ts_count_nans(ts_delta(anl4_netprofit_mean, 90), 365) used to quantify frequency of valid deltas as proxy for persistent upgrades. S1 single field with ts_count_nans; S2 N/A; S3 coverage good. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Large negative surprise in research & development expense vs estimate
results.description: subtract(research_development_expense_reported_value, est_rd_expense) to detect R&D spending surprises. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 both have low coverage (0.3797 & 0.3131) so applied ts_backfill(research_development_expense_reported_value, 365). Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Earnings upgrades concentrated in specific brokers (group_cartesian_product)
results.description: group_cartesian_product(broker_group, industry_group) combined with group_count(ts_delta(est_eps,90), group_cartesian_product) (conceptually) to find broker-industry pockets. S1 uses group operator as required; S2 N/A; S3 est_eps coverage good. Implementation note: group parameter provided at runtime. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: Large change in reported pretax income vs guidance
results.description: subtract(pretax_income_reported, ts_backfill(min_pretax_profit_guidance,365)) to find deviations. S1 uses backfill for guidance missingness; S2 N/A; S3 applied ts_backfill due to guidance sometimes missing. Confidence 0.36.

results.idea: Persistent positive cashflow surprises (count over year)
results.description: ts_count_nans(greater(subtract(anl4_cfo_value, est_cashflow_op), 0), 252) counts quarters with positive CFO surprises. S1 used comparator inside ts_count_nans; S2 N/A; S3 anl4_cfo_value coverage moderate. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Earnings beats with falling forecast dispersion (confidence)
results.description: and(greater(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), 0), less(ts_zscore(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, 90), 0)). S1 combined beat and dispersion drop; S2 N/A; S3 dispersion coverage moderate. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Momentum in announced EPS relative to last announced (last_diff_value)
results.description: last_diff_value(anl4_af_eps_value, 180) captures the last change magnitude. S1 single operator; S2 N/A; S3 coverage high; S4 used widely. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Earnings acceleration vs analyst recommendation IR
results.description: divide(ts_delta(est_eps,180), ts_std_dev(anl4_total_rec,180)) to see revisions per recommendation volatility. S1 two ts operators; S2 N/A; S3 total_rec coverage 0.6243. Confidence 0.47.

results.idea: Large increase in forecast standard deviation (risk onset)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, 30) positive spikes indicate increasing disagreement. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage moderate; S4 reasonable. Confidence 0.43.

results.idea: Sharp drop in forecast counts (coverage deterioration)
results.description: ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_numest, 60) negative large values show falling analyst coverage. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage good. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Earnings surprise scaled by forecast dispersion (robust signal)
results.description: divide(subtract(anl4_af_eps_value, est_eps), ts_backfill(anl4_qf_az_dts_spe, 365)) to avoid NaNs. S1 used backfill due to dispersion sometimes sparse; S2 N/A; S3 applied ts_backfill because coverage borderline. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Rising number of upper estimates with rising EPS (strong confirmation)
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(anl4_basicconafv110_pu, 90), 0), greater(ts_delta(est_eps, 90), 0)). S1 two trends; S2 N/A; S3 both coverages good. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Cash flow per share announced beat vs estimate
results.description: subtract(anl4_af_cfps_value, anl4_afv4_cfps_mean) to detect CFPS surprises. S1 two fields; S2 N/A; S3 cfps fields coverage low so ts_backfill might be applied; S4 userCounts low. Confidence 0.34.

results.idea: Sustained upgrades in adjusted funds from operations
results.description: ts_delta(max_adjusted_funds_from_operations_guidance, 365). S1 guidance delta used; S2 N/A; S3 coverage often perfect for guidance fields; S4 limited userCount but reliable guidance. Confidence 0.4.

results.idea: Earnings estimate acceleration vs total goodwill changes
results.description: and(greater(ts_delta(est_eps, 180), 0.05), greater(ts_delta(total_goodwill_amount, 180), 0)). S1 two deltas; S2 N/A; S3 goodwill coverage low (0.3761) so ts_backfill recommended but not included to keep concise. Confidence 0.3.

results.idea: Rapid downgrades in EBIT estimates
results.description: reverse(ts_delta(anl4_ebit_mean, 90)) to capture sudden drops. S1 single field; S2 N/A; S3 coverage 0.7097 good; S4 userCount moderate. Confidence 0.44.
